header.name: File Count
header.description: Number of files in this PAK.

header.name: File Index Table Offset
header.description: A pointer to the location of the file index table

fileindextable.name: File Index Entries
fileindextable.description: An array of Header.FileCount File Index Entries describing the files in this PAK.

fileindexentry.name: Raw Size
fileindexentry.description: The size of this file, in bytes, as it is on the disk in the PAK.

fileindexentry.name: Real Size
fileindexentry.description: The size of this file, in bytes, when decompressed. This value may be zero, which simply means that you will not be able to pre-allocate a buffer when decompressing.

fileindexentry.name: Compressed Size
fileindexentry.description: The size of this file, in bytes, when compressed in the PAK. Should be the same as Raw Size.

fileindexentry.name: File Data Offset
fileindexentry.description: A pointer to the location of this file's data.

fileindexentry.name: Unknown A
fileindexentry.description: Unknown. Seems to have no effect.

fileindexentry.name: Unknown B
fileindexentry.description: Unknown. Seems to be just padding for future expansion. Filled with NUL bytes.
